free: #e A rooster crowed.
#c 公雞啼了。
#e An old man went to pick fruits.
#c 一個老人去摘水果。
#e Three baskets were there.
#c 有三籃在那裡。
#e (He) kept on picking fruits.
#c (他)繼續摘水果。
#e There was one bag which was full (of fruits).
#c  有一個袋子裝滿了。
#e (He) kept on picking (fruits).
#c (他)還在繼續摘。
#e (The bag) which was full fell down.
#c (袋子)滿了有一顆水果掉下來。
#e He came down and put down (the fruits).
#c 他下來而且(把水果)放下來。
#e Two baskets were full.
#c 有兩籃滿了。
#e One (fruit) fell down from the basket and (he) took (it).
#c 一個(水果)掉出籃子來(他就)拿(了)。
#e Wiped it with a handkerchief.
#c 用手帕把它擦一擦。
#e Put (it) back in the basket.
#c 把它放回籃子。
#e (He) climbed up the tree again to pick (more fruits).
#c 他又爬上去摘更多的水果。
#e A man coming; (he) was pulling a cow.
#c 有一個男人拉著一頭牛過來。
#e Seeing the cow might have wanted to eat the fruits that had been picked, he dragged it past (the basket with fruits).
#c 看到牛可能想要吃水果, 他把它(從那籃水果子旁)拖走。
#e (Off) they went.
#c 他們走了。
#e (Off) they went. (Then I) see another boy coming; he was riding a bike."
#c 他們走了. 又看到另一個男孩子來了; 他騎著腳踏車。
#e (the kind of) vehicle (of which) two legs turn.
#c 兩隻腳踩腳踏車。
#n 轉動，如同輪子轉動
#n Note: turn, as in "wheels turning"
#e There (he) saw the old man picking fruits on top of the tree.
#c 經過那裡看到老人在樹上面摘水果。
#e
#c
#n sakosiza 直譯為東張西望"head turning left and right"
#n Note: sakosiza is literally translated as "to turn head in every direction as if looking for something".
#e (He) looked around and did not see (the man). (He) saw the fruits.
#c (他)東張西望, 沒有看到(那個老人)。 (他)看到水果。
#e (He) liked (the fruits) in the basket.
#c (他)喜歡籃子裡的(水果)。
#e (He) took (a basket).
#c (他就)拿了(一籃)。
#e (He) put down his bike and (I) saw (him) lift one basket on (his) bike. (And then) he (rode) his bike and left (with that blasket).
#c (他)放下它的腳踏車, (我)看到(他)提起一籃水果放到它的車上. (然後)他騎他(載著)偷走(的水果)的腳踏車走了。
#e (The boy) left quickly.
#c (男孩)很快的離開。
#e (I) saw him run into a girl on a bike.
#c (我)看到他撞到騎腳踏車的女孩。
#e Their bikes bumped (into something/each other).
#c 他們的腳踏車撞在一起。
#e The boy looked around and bumped into the girl.
#c 男孩東張西望, 就撞到那女孩。
#e (The boy) fell down, and all the fruits in his basket were about to spill over the place.
#c (男孩)跌倒 籃子裡所有的水果快要全部撒翻出來。
#e (The fruits) are gone.
#c (水果)全部掉了。
#e (I) saw three children coming to help (the boy) pick the fruits up.
#c (我)看到三個小孩過來幫忙檢起水果。
#e And then (they were putting the fruits that had been picked) into the basket. A person came to shake the dirt off (his) clothes.
#c 然後他們就把水果放進籃子裡 有一個人過來拍掉他衣服上的灰塵。
#e (There) came (a boy who) helped lift (the basket) onto the bike.
#c 有一個男孩過來幫忙把籃子提到腳踏車上。
#e
#c
#n 泰雅語
#n Note: Atayal
#e The three persons left and they parted ways.
#c 那三個人離開, 然後他們就分開了。
#e The three persons saw a hat there.
#c 那三個人看到一個帽子在那裡。
#e (The boy) forgot his hat. (One of the three children) called him and said, "this is your hat.
#c 男孩忘了他的帽子。 有一個小孩就叫他, 然後說"這是你的帽子"。
#e The child returned and went to give him back the hat.
#c 小孩回頭把帽子還給他。
#e (He) thanked (the children) and gave each of the three a fruit; then they left.
#c 他謝謝那些小孩。然後給他們三人每人一個水果, 然後就離開。
#e The boy left.
#c 男孩離開了。
#e The three persons also went away.
#c 三個人也走了。
#e The old man picking fruits there climbed down (the tree).
#c 那個摘水果的老人從樹上爬下來。
#e Where are my baskets here? There were three. One basket was filled with fruits. Where is it?
#c 有一個裝滿水果的籃子哪裡去了?
#e (He) thought he saw there were three boys passing by there.
#c 他看到三個小孩經過那裡心想。
#e Each with a fruit on his hand.
#c 每個人手上都有一個水果。
#e That's all. Hahaha.
#c 沒有了 哈哈哈。
